metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32637 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.Description: GBrowse accepts files with any formats uploaded and places them in the areaaccessible through unauthenticated web requests. Therefore, anyone who canupload files through the product may execute arbitrary code on the server.

criterions.comment: gbrowse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
